_header: But why am I so abused
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 293.
_description: A lover’s complaint — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd5465.First Lines: But why am I so abusyd…
BLAdd5465.Note: With music in three voices credited to William Newarke.
